page.title: 04VANDALISM
page.content: There is a lot of vandalism in the New Mills area. It is caused by teenagers who are unemployed and have no jobs. There is a butcher's roof where children and teenagers climb up and slide down the other side and make all the slates fall off the roof. There has been a bus shelter just built over Low Leighton which has been written on by vandals. There is a laundrette which has been all boarded up and people write on the wood and try to break into it. We think there should be more facilities for the younger generation. There should have been a sports hall built but they built a clinic instead. by Karen Bramwell and Stephen Done.
